transcript.message: Look, I've already wasted 10 days with another bank. They promised quick approval and did nothing. Don't tell me now that you will
Look, I've already wasted 10 days with another bank. They promised quick approval and did nothing. Don't
Sorry for inconvenience. How can I help you?

Honestly, yaar, I need a personal loan of ₹2.5 lakh right now for a bike. The offer I have expires in three days. I can’t afford another delay. So tell me—how fast can you actually get this approved? And what’s the real processing fee, not some hidden charge later?
